page.title: 08Local views of the Expansion
page.content: {Claire Lawton}(age 9) lives in Shaw. "I like it in some ways but not in others. When the new houses come near us there will be more people to play with but I liked going into the field next to us where there is a stream, soon I won't be able to go in. But it will be a while before the builder reaches us so I might as well make the most of the time I've got !". {Mrs. M.U. Leatherland}has lived in Shaw for 20 years. "To those of us who preferred the peace and quiet of the country, free from diesel fumes it is a nightmare. Now they have cut the village into 3 pieces, most of us in this area feel nothing but contempt for the council who cares nothing for the people living here. I'm sure we are the only town in the world with so many roundabouts ".
